item.title: Total connect Comfort
item.content:encoded:
[Low] - TCC Application Issues

Some customers are experiencing issues with our TCC application, but the thermostat can still be used directly to control your heating and cooling system. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Summary: Some customers are experiencing issues with the TCC application, but a direct thermostat control is still operational.

Mar 5, 14:40 UTC
Investigating - We are aware some of our customers are experiencing issues with our TCC application. The thermostat can still be used directly to control your heating and cooling system. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

item.title: Resideo Smart Home
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Major Maintenance Scheduled Summary: The app is undergoing a major maintenance period, causing platform downtime. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 27, 05:00 - 09:00 UTC

Feb 27, 04:36 UTC
Scheduled - The app has an upcoming maintenance scheduled. We apologize for any inconvenience caused during this period.

item.title: Resideo Smart Home
item.content:encoded:

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 26, 05:00 - 09:00 UTC

Feb 26, 04:42 UTC
Scheduled - The app has an upcoming maintenance scheduled. We apologize for any inconvenience caused during this period.

item.title: Cellular Communicators & TC2 Services
item.content:encoded:
High - Service Outage Summary: All services have been restored after a critical outage caused disruption to our systems.

Feb 22, 23:10 UTC
Investigating - All Services have been restored

item.title: Cellular Communicators & TC2 Services
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Cellular Outage in the United States

Summary: Cellular outage with major US carriers may impact AlarmNet and TC2 Remote connections. [Medium] - Service Restoration

Summary: All services have been restored following the cellular outage.

Feb 22, 23:03 UTC
Resolved - All Services have now been restored.

Feb 22, 15:52 UTC
Update - A cellular outage in the United States was reported by AT&T users early on February 22nd, 2024 which potentially will affect AlarmNet Cellular Communicators and Services.

Feb 22, 12:00 UTC
Investigating - A cellular outage in the United States was reported by AT&T, T-Mobile, Verizon and other network users early on February 22nd, 2024 which potentially will affect AlarmNet Cellular Communicators, TC2 Remote connections and PSD status messages.

item.title: AlarmNet/TC2
item.content:encoded:
[High] - AlarmNet Issue impacting Network Connectivity and Total Connect 2.0 Functionality

Summary: Some ProSeries & LTEMP LTE AT&T communicators may experience signaling issues impacting Central Station communication. This issue is being worked on for immediate resolution. [Medium] - AlarmNet Issue impacting Network Connectivity and Total Connect 2.0 Functionality

Summary: A small number of ProSeries & LTEMP LTE AT&T communicators may experience signaling issues which could result in a communication failure message generated to Central Station. This issue is being worked w/ AT&T for immediate resolution. [Low] - AlarmNet Issue impacting Network Connectivity and Total Connect 2.0 Functionality

Summary: All services are running normally.

Feb 14, 21:32 UTC
Resolved - All services are running normally.

Feb 14, 20:21 UTC
Update - A small number of ProSeries & LTEMP LTE AT&T communicators may experience signaling issues which could result in a communication failure message generated to Central Station.
This issue is being worked w/ AT&T for immediate resolution.

Feb 14, 17:41 UTC
Investigating - AlarmNet is experiencing some issues impacting network connectivity and Total Connect 2.0 functionality. This may impact end user's remote capability. We appreciate your patience while we work to resolve this issue.
